alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued April 02 at 3:20AM PDT until April 02 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING FOR LAKE TAHOE... * CHANGES...Extended Lake Wind Advisory into this evening. * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Lake Tahoe. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. Lake waters will be rough, and small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
